message.content:
We need to “calculate” the final depreciation value. In our data there are depreciation transactions. In the list there is a depreciation entry on 2024‑01‑01 (Depreciation20240101001) with an amount of 45740.94 and then a later entry on 2024‑02‑01 (Depreciation20240201002) with an amount of 71799.68000000001. The “final” depreciation is the one from the latest date. Rounding (or formatting) to two decimals, it becomes 71799.68.

Thus, the final depreciation item is 71799.68.

Below is the answer in the required JSON format:

------------------------------------------------

{"solution": {"Depreciation": "71799.68"}}
